Author: MadLassWithABox
Text: I feel like each time I cycle, I end up with slightly less lean mass (I gain mostly fat on binges and lose a mix of fat and muscle on restriction). That does lower my metabolism which makes it slower to lose weight and means I look flabbier than I did at previous LWs.  I’m really trying to focus on some muscle building in my current restriction cycle, but it’s difficult to accept a high enough calorie intake.

Author: smanzis
Text: I am one month b/r cycle "free" (i am still restricting and disordered but at least out of THAT cycle), and i have gained :(, while when i was b/ring my weight changed but was way more reasonable, in the sense that it followed my projections and changed strictly according to my caloric intake. As of know the only reason i can think of for my weight increase is because i started going to the gym.
